list.name: Changes
list.comment:
building the basis for a turned based text based game but I need to implement stacks. the cooldowns will help since I can add the skills to a list and i can use peek(); to see if the previous skill is still on cooldown but I need to use push and .isEmpty(); maybe i can implement in moving around the map
9/14/2024: Setting up monster and player skills implemented interfaces for modularity, each skill is responsible for its own methods leading to more robust skills added to other base classes, but nothing notable currently building combat logic to stack skills for cooldown need to implement peek(): will implement REDO ATTACK DEFEND SKILL EQUIP will need to place skills into an array that I can select from will work on weapons class next which will add buffs to player attributes based off item TODO: need to build simple map and use stack logic to move from one area to the next need to create random encounters need to finish weapons class need to create equipment need to create action list??
stopping for the night finished basic combat but it is still broken
worked on movement and setting up for special events need to build special events created run function but need to make better can look at map to see where player it
combat is less broken need to fix issue with monster attacking multiple times and if i uise the other code i exit right after I attack
fixed issue of re-instantiating player a second time when maze is created
currently runs but I am facing issues where turns will still execute even after death. need to still refactor turn based fight logic.
